alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 10:59AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 35 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1059 AM MST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 8 miles north of Eagle to near Basalt to 14 miles northeast of Cedaredge and moving east at 20 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Eagle, Carbondale and Basalt around 1105 AM MST. Snowmass around 1120 AM MST. Avon around 1140 AM MST. Vail around 1200 PM MST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 136 and 189. Colorado 82 between mile markers 11 and 43. Colorado 131 between mile markers 1 and 10. Colorado 133 between mile markers 24 and 68. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
